intro1: A modern electronics retail store with the first after-sales service in Jayapura. We sell office and household electronic products from various brands with warranties and high quality at affordable prices. Get the latest products with the newest technology at our store. Visit www.jayaelektronik.com and enjoy various exciting, high-quality, guaranteed promotions, and official warranties.
intro2: With extensive experience since 1994, we understand customer needs and satisfaction. With our motto “Smart Shopping with a Guarantee”, we ensure the lowest prices and officially guaranteed products. To get information about our products and services, visit our offline and online stores located in Percetakan, Abepura, and Sentani. Jaya Elektronik is now online to make shopping easier for electronic and household products. Visit www.jayaelektronik.com for the best product quality and prices.
